participant_1.background:
I value my car because it allows me to be independent and travel wherever I want.
i am in medical school.
i work in a circus as a juggler.
i am an international business man.
i like reading.

participant_2.background:
I love the rain because it gives me an excuse to stay indoors and read my romance novels.
I love to go to the deli because I can get a sandwich that is both delicious and affordable.
i wait tables at a cafe.
Others will be inspired by my work and see that it is possible to make a living doing what you love, even if you didn't go to college.
i have long fingers.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do on a rainy day?
I love to stay in and read romance novels.
Me too! I love the feeling of being cozy and warm inside while it's raining outside.
I know, right? It's the best.
I have a few favorites, but I'd have to say my favorite is "The Notebook."
Oh, I love that one! I've read it so many times.
Me too! I've read it at least three times.
What do you like about it so much?
I love the story and the characters. It's so romantic and heartwarming.
I agree. It's a classic for a reason.
Yes, I have. It's really good, too.
I love the movie! It's so faithful to the book.
Me too! I'm glad we have the same taste in romance novels.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who appreciates good romance
